API¶

uptimer.helpers.check_url(url)[source]¶

Send HEAD request to the url and return the HTTP status code

Parameters

url (str) – URL to check

Returns

HTTP status code

Return type

int

uptimer.helpers.colorize_status(url, status)[source]¶

Print the URL and status in color to the terminal

Parameters

  • url (str) – URL to print

  • status (str) – status used to determine the color of the output

uptimer¶

Check urls and print their HTTP statuses (with colors)

param urls

URL (or a tuple with multiple URLs) to check

type urls

str or tuple(str)

param daemon

If set to True, after checking all URLs, sleep for 5 seconds and check them again

type daemon

bool

uptimer [OPTIONS] URLS...

Options

-d, --daemon¶

Arguments

URLS¶

Required argument(s)

Uptimer
